thread.title: Micromax Canvas Juice 3 Goes on Sale in India for $135
thread.title_full: Micromax Canvas Juice 3 Goes on Sale in India for $135 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Micromax Canvas Juice 3 Goes on Sale in India for $135
text: Indian handset maker Micromax has just released yet another affordable Android smartphone, which is already available for purchase at various retailers across the country. The Canvas Juice 3 is the sequel to Juice 2, which made it to India back in March. The new device comes with improved specs and a decent price. According to a new rep... Â»
